section.p: By default, the Metrics Agent uses the HTTP protocol for communication with the Monitoring API and the OpenStack Keystone service. For a more secure connection, can be configured to use the HTTPS protocol.
The following sections describe the preparations required for HTTPS as well as changes required to the default configuration of your environment.
section.note: The installer has not been updated for configuring HTTPS communication. The following configuration tasks can be implemented as soon as the installation of the involved components is successful.
